body:
This chart below details the article distribution relative to the SASB's 5 main topics. 

For each article we consider the strongest (max) SASB Topic Relevance Score, which then allow us to define the distribution of articles throughout all 5 topics. 

When clicking on a **main Topic Bar**, this updates the chart on the right hand side with the more granular distribution per sub-topic.

Looking at this chart you should be able to judge in which proportion each topic is represented throughout the overall company data. In white is the industry benchmark.
